description.english: In Steam Era, maintain 8 factories at full load for 10 consecutive Cycles
description.german: Halte im Dampfzeitalter 8 Fabriken 10 Zyklen lang unter Volllast am Laufen
description.french: À l'ère de la vapeur, maintenez 8 usines en fonctionnement à pleine charge pendant 10 cycles

description.tchinese: 在蒸汽時代，維持8個工廠滿負載連續運轉10個循環

description.english: In Space Era, maintain 20,000 Dormant Population for 10 consecutive Cycles

description.japanese: 宇宙時代で、2万の休眠人口を10サイクル維持する

description.english: Maintain building forcibly running under ambient temperature exceeding working population's tolerance
